title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Wednesday, 4 November 2015 - BBC News
summary: mother responsible for four-month-old son 's death given suspended prison sentence .
witness tells inquest of `` chaos '' at a northampton club where two women were killed in 2011 .
former factory in irthlingborough could become two shops and 20 homes .
duston neighbourhood plan referendum to be held tomorrow .
we 'll be back with more news , travel , sport and weather from 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: local live is finished for northamptonshire today but we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 , with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel for the county .

documents.title: woman 's mobile phone and ipod stolen in northampton nightclub
text: a woman had her mobile phone and ipod stolen while she was in a northampton nightclub .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: weather : showers tonight and tomorrow
text: cloudy with scattered showers tonight , with lows of around 8-10c ( upper 40sf ) .
a cloudy day tomorrow with the chance of a few showers .
highs around 15c ( 59f ) .
author: Chris Bell
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: northamptonshire health care area in top 10 for e. coli cases
text: while corby had the second lowest number of cases of e. coli from september 2014 and september 2015 , the nene clinical commissioning group , which looks after health for much of northamptonshire , was in the top 10 for the number of infections .
the nene area was 8th with 436 cases .
author: BBC News England

documents.title: teenager in northampton praised after fire in home
text: a 15-year-old boy who called 999 when a fire started in his kitchen , and quickly spread - blocking both the front and back door , has been praised .
officers praised his quick thinking and said he remained calm and followed instructions to go to the bathroom , put towels around the door and open the window .
he was taken to hospital for a precautionary check-up following the incident in briar hill , northampton on monday .
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: cobblers prepare to face coventry for first time in 25 years
text: northampton town are also in fa cup first round action this week , as they travel to coventry city along with at least 1,400 fans .
they 've been looking back to the last time the sides played : january 1990 , when steve berry scored the only goal in a 1-0 win for the cobblers .

documents.title: locals pitching in to help brackley town prepare for fa cup first round
text: i 've been down to st. james park in brackley to see how the club are getting ready for this sunday 's fa cup first round tie against newport county .
plenty of locals have been helping out to make sure everything is in good shape .
not only will there be full coverage on bbc radio northampton , but the match will also be live on the bbc red button .
author: Joe Townsend
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : mother who killed baby given suspended jail sentence daventry college building work begins
text: headlines : mother who killed baby given suspended jail sentence daventry college building work begins
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: 'no-one should feel guilty ' over baby death
text: sentencing eloise burton-cope for manslaughter , the judge said `` no-one should feel guilty about what happened '' .
ms burton-cope , 33 , had admitted killing her four-month-old son leon in deanshanger in march 2014 .
she was given a two-year prison sentence , suspended for two years .
birmingham crown court heard that she had suffered from depression .
author: Nikki Fox
BBC Look East

documents.title: mum who admitted manslaughter of baby 'must have medical treatment '
text: the mother of four-month-old leon cope , who died from head injuries sustained at his home in deanshanger , has been told that she will have to engage in medical treatments .
eloise burton-cope , 33 , who now lives in milton keynes , was given a suspended two-year prison sentence for the manslaughter of her son .
the judge said it was `` unfortunate '' that her medical condition was not recognised at the time but `` no-one is to blame '' , adding `` it is very easy to be wise after the event '' .
author: Nikki Fox
BBC Look East

documents.title: breakingmother responsible for four-month-old son 's death given suspended prison sentence
text: eloise burton-cope , the mother who admitted causing the death of her four-month-old son in deanshanger , has been sentenced to two years in prison , suspended for two years .

documents.title: northampton saints rededicate their war memorial
text: at franklin 's gardens today the saints have rededicated their war memorial to the 12 players they lost in world war one .
the war memorial had to be moved for the development of the new barwell stand , which is now completed and will host its first game this saturday against saracens .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: see the population of northamptonshire as 100 people
text: next week northamptonshire county council is discussing the local account for adult social care services document .
i 've been looking through it and it contains this fascinating wheel of statistics about the population of northamptonshire :
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: e. coli infections up but corby is one of the lowest rates in england
text: the number of people infected with e. coli across england rose by more than 1,000 last year , but corby had the second lowest number of infections .
the figures frompublic health englandshowed wirral had the lowest number , 17 , followed by corby with 47 .
the highest number from september 2014 to september 2015 was dorset with 629 infections .
author: BBC News England

documents.title: new bbc weather watchers across the county
text: weather watchers have been sharing their photos of the the unsettled weather in northamptonshire .
what 's it like where you are ?
create your own weather reports on the weather watchers website .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: northamptonshire family evicted due to anti social behaviour and having drugs on the property
text: a family were evicted from a kettering borough council property for allowing drugs to be present at the property as well as causing misery to the neighbours with continued acts of anti-social behaviour .
author: Northants Herald & Post

documents.title: broken down train causing disruption through northampton
text: a `` defective '' train at cheddington earlier this afternoon has caused delays on london midland through northampton and long buckby .
# cheddington update 3 : disruption is expected on the euston / northampton / b'ham new st line until approx 16:15 .

documents.title: did greyfriars bus station drive people mad ?
text: news magazine has looked at when concrete buildings drive people mad , and feature the recently demolished greyfriars bus station in northampton .

the twentieth century society , which campaigns to protect post-war architecture , said that the demolition added to the myth that brutalist buildings were monsters , but the council said that its removal would breathe new life into the area .
author: BBC News UK

documents.title: new look franklin 's gardens ready for rugby this weekend
text: i 'm been down to northampton saints today and took the chance to take up my commentary position in the partially redeveloped franklin 's gardens
a new look from my seat at @ twitterid this season
@ twitterid how 's stadium mk
@ twitterid it was good thanks , but good to be back at the gardensz
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid # dreamteamsaturday
@ twitterid @ twitterid looks pretty good gm ca n't wait to see it properly on saturday .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: sentencing of mother responsible for four-month-old son 's death
text: we are expecting the sentencing of a mother who was responsible for the death of her four-month-old son in their home in deanshanger at 15:30 .
eloise burton cope , who now lives in milton keynes , pleaded guilty to manslaughter after she shook baby leon .
she was suffering from post natal depression .
author: Nikki Fox
BBC Look East

documents.title: today 's big boughton house gardens
text: the main image on today 's page is of the gardens at boughton house .
the stately home near kettering has strong links to bonfire night , and we 'll have more about that tomorrow .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: careers day for primary school pupils
text: it was a busy day on tuesday for pupils at weedon bec primary as they discovered more about different jobs .
author: Daventry Express

documents.title: £ 13m daventry campus site building work begins
text: work has begun on daventry 's £ 13m northampton college campus , which could start welcoming students next year .
the work at the badby road site will first involve the construction of new buildings and sports pitches , and then demolition of the existing buildings .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton nightclub crush : witness 'could n't find her friend ' who later died
text: a friend of laurene-danielle jackson , 19 , who died at lava & ignite in northampton in 2011 , says she had gone to the cloakroom after hearing announcements for the coach back to luton and then could n't find ms jackson .
sabrina dafoure found a man with ms jackson 's belongings , but her friend had been taken to hospital .
ms jackson and nabila nanfuka , 22 , were killed in a crush at the club .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: plan for wind turbine near lyveden new bield considered tonight
text: east northamptonshire councillors will tonight be considering an application for a single wind turbine on farmland near the village of brigstock , around three miles away from lyveden new bield .
the 77-metre-high turbine would be built at bullymore 's farm , off grafton road , but there is some opposition to the plan .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : rain but some brightness
text: there may be the odd spot of rain around but things should turn drier through the afternoon , with a little brightness perhaps .
top temperature today of 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: woman freed from car by fire service after two vehicle collision in wellingborough
text: a woman had to be cut out of her car after two cars crashed in wellingborough last night .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: mother due to be sentenced for manslaughter of four-month-old son was 'let down '
text: the defence has been speaking in the sentencing of eloise burton-cope for the manslaughter for her four-month-old son leon .
they have told the court that mrs burton-cope 's family feel they do n't need to forgive her , as her actions were outside her control because of mental health problems .
the defence say she `` was let down probably because of resources '' , adding : `` it was clear she was vulnerable because of previous mental health problems . ''
author: Nikki Fox
BBC Look East

documents.title: headlines : mum due to be sentenced for baby 's death daventry college building work starts
text: here are our top stories :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: isham has 'had 10 % increase on traffic '
text: campaigners for a bypass for the village of isham on the a509 say there 's been a big increase in the amount of traffic there .
volunteers carried out a vehicle count yesterday and it showed over 25,000 cars , vans and lorries passing through the village - an increase of 10 % on four year ago .
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton nightclub crush : 'chaos ' and 'long lines of people outside '
text: a witness has told the inquest into the deaths of two students at a northampton nightclub in 2011 that when she arrived there were long lines of people outside .
hannah kirkby , who travelled to northampton by coach from loughborough , said she lost track of everyone she was with on the way out of the club .
she said outside `` there was chaos - people were crying '' .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: ceremony at new primary school in corby
text: yesterday there was a topping out ceremony for the new primary school and community facility at priors hall park in corby .
the new two-form entry primary school will accommodate up to 420 children .
it will open next year , a year after it was due to .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: mother to be sentenced for baby son 's manslaughter 'had been treated for psychosis '
text: at the sentencing of eloise burton-cope , for the manslaughter of her four-month-old son leon cope in their home in deanshanger , the crown court in birmingham has been hearing how leon had been crying for days after having his injections .

they have also heard how burton-cope , 33 , had been treated for psychosis a few months beforehand and was in care of mental health liaison team , and how her mental state of mind may have been down to sleep deprivation .
leon was taken to hospital by his mother and had brain damage and a fractured skull - injuries consistent with being shaken .
author: Nikki Fox
BBC Look East

documents.title: saints war memorial rededicated today
text: northampton saints are rededicating the war memorial at franklin 's gardens this afternoon , after it was moved during redevelopment of the stadium .
this was the scene in 1922 when the memorial was unveiled .
i 'll be there later , along with descendants of the 12 men on the memorial .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: public inquiry over refused 1,000 homes plan south of northampton set for next month
text: a 10-day planning inquiry is set to take place next month after a bid to build up to 1,000 homes on a swathe of land to the south of northampton was refused .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: northampton nightclub crush : 'too many people let in '
text: this morning at the inquest into the deaths of nabila nanfuka , 22 , and laurene-danielle jackson , 19 , we heard from corrine vanderpuye , who said the organisers `` let in too many people '' .
she said : `` i 've been to the club many times before and it 's been busy , but not that busy . ''
she told the jury she got caught in the crush and saw a girl fall .
ms vanderpuye said she heard shouts of `` she 's on the floor , she 's on the floor '' .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton nightclub crush : djs 'unlikely ' to turn up at inquest
text: here at the inquest into the death of two students at the lava ignite nightclub in october 2011 , the coroner has told the jury that it is looking unlikely that the djs from the night will turn up to give evidence .
they were due to appear on monday .
earlier this week the jury heard the 14 announcements the djs made over the space of half an hour , telling people not to miss their buses on the night .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: duston to hold referendum on 'hefty document '
text: tomorrow , residents in duston in northampton will vote in a referendum on their 70-page plus neighbourhood plan .
frances jones , chairman of the parish council , was involved in writing the plan and said it needed to be complex .
it is a thick hefty document but it has to be because it is covering all the things we need to .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : four-month-old baby death sentencing today opposition to brigstock wind farm
text: here 's what we are looking at :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: women to be sentenced for four-month-old son 's death
text: i 'm at birmingham crown court , where a woman is due to be sentenced after admitting responsibility for the death of her baby boy in northamptonshire .
eloise burton cope , who now lives in milton keynes , pleaded guilty to manslaughter after her four-month-old son leon died from head injuries in march last year .
he was seriously injured at his home in deanshanger .
ms cope had severe post natal depression , the court had heard .
author: Nikki Fox
BBC Look East

documents.title: rushden driver bids to race against f1 stars sebastian vettel and jenson button
text: a rushden racing driver is appealing for people from across the county to vote for him to be given the chance to compete against formula 1 stars such as jenson button and sebastian vettel .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: irthlingborough shoe factory site in conservation area could become supermarket
text: it 's hoped that the development on the site of a former shoe factory on church street beside st peter 's church will breathe new life into irthlingborough town centre .
but there are concerns about the look of the development , which is in a conservation area , and the impact the shops will have on other retailers .
plans for a supermarket plus another unit , which could be a shop , restaurant or cafe will be discussed tonight .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton nightclub crush : inquest continues today
text: i 'm heading back to northampton county hall today for the inquest into the deaths of laurene-danielle jackson , 19 , and nabila nanfuka , 22 , who were fatally crushed at the lava and ignite club in northampton .
yesterday we heard from friends of the two students who were there on the night , and today we are expecting to hear from the organisers of the event and a fire officer .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: aston villa goalkeeper and ex-cobbler mark bunn to try and raise £ 100k to help save northampton town
text: a premier league goalkeeper has added his voice to the growing list of people trying to save northampton town football club from collapse .
author: Northants Herald & Post

documents.title: former irthlingborough shoe factory site could become shops and houses
text: the express works shoe factory on church street in irthlingborough closed in the 1980s and the buildings were destroyed by fire in 2007 , but there are plans for a supermarket and 22 affordable homes for the site .
previous proposals for a supermarket have been turned down , but east northamptonshire council 's planning officers are to recommend planning permission is granted at a meeting tonight .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: duston to hold neighbourhood plan vote
text: tomorrow a referendum will be held in duston , in northampton , giving residents the chance to vote on the area 's neighbourhood plan .
if backed by the public the document , which is over 70 pages long , would be used when future planning applications are looked at .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : showery rain , may be drier later
text: a dull and misty start with showery rain but could be drier through the afternoon with a top temperature of 13c ( 55f ) .
you can watch my full forecast below
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : duston referendum tomorrow irthlingborough shops application considered tonight
text: here are our top stories :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: a14 lane closed between junction 1 and 2 after lorry crash
text: there is one lane closed on the a14 eastbound between junction 2 for the a508 and junction 1 for the a5199 because of a collision between two lorries .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: between now and 18:00 we 'll bring you the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire from the bbc newsroom in northampton .
if you want to reach us then you canemail , tweet usorhead to facebook .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
